# vtmn-progressbar



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property        | Attribute       | Description                           | Type                                  | Default     |
| --------------- | --------------- | ------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `currentValue`  | `currentvalue`  | The current value of the progressbar. | `number`                              | `50`        |
| `indeterminate` | `indeterminate` | The size of the progressbar.          | `boolean`                             | `false`     |
| `labelText`     | `labeltext`     | The label of the linear progressbar.  | `string`                              | `'Loading'` |
| `maxValue`      | `maxvalue`      | The maximum value of the progressbar. | `number`                              | `100`       |
| `minValue`      | `minvalue`      | The minimum value of the progressbar. | `number`                              | `0`         |
| `size`          | `size`          | The size of the progressbar.          | `"large" \| "medium" \| "small"`      | `'medium'`  |
| `variant`       | `variant`       | The variant of the progressbar.       | `"circular" \| "default" \| "linear"` | `'default'` |
